mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( name, login_id, password, question, answer, email, phone_number, address, birth, gender ) VALUE ( #{name}, #{login_id}, #{password}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{gender} )
mapper.select: SELECT login_id, password FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId}
SELECT login_id FROM member WHERE name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
SELECT id, login_id, profile FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND password = #{password}
SELECT id FROM member WHERE login_id = #{loginId} AND name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
SELECT q.question FROM member m, security_questions q WHERE m.question = q.id AND m.id = #{id}
SELECT answer FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE following = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow WHERE follower = #{id}
SELECT id, login_id, profile FROM member WHERE id IN ( SELECT following FROM follow WHERE following = #{id} )
SELECT id, login_id, profile FROM member WHERE id IN ( SELECT following FROM follow WHERE follower = #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name = #{name}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address}, gender = #{gender} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM follow WHERE follower = #{follower} AND following = #{following}
